trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector"></xref> class should ignore a particular <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage"></xref> property while creating an <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef"></xref> for a <xref href="System.MarshalByRefObject"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om den <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector"> </xref> klasse skal ignorere en bestemt <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage"> </xref> egenskapen under oppretting av en <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef"> </xref> for en <xref href="System.MarshalByRefObject"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The MessageSurrogateFilter delegate is intended for use only by the remoting infrastructure of the .NET Framework; you should not instantiate the delegate directly.
trans-unit.target: Representanten MessageSurrogateFilter er ment for bruk av ekstern kommunikasjon infrastruktur av .NET Framework; Du kan ikke starte representanten direkte.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector.Filter%2A> property of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector> class gets and sets a MessageSurrogateFilter instance.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector.Filter%2A>for den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector>klassen får eller angir en forekomst av MessageSurrogateFilter.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector.Filter%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each key/value parameter pair is a remoting message property that belongs to the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage.Properties%2A> property of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage> class.
trans-unit.target: Hver parameter nøkkel/verdi-paret er en ekstern kommunikasjon meldingsegenskapen som hører til <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage.Properties%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage>klassen.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage.Properties%2A>
